meta.concept: Previous day's high, low, and close act as key reference points
meta.institutional_use: Banks and funds watch these levels closely

pdh.name: Previous Day High
pdh.description: Highest price reached previous trading day

pdl.name: Previous Day Low
pdl.description: Lowest price reached previous trading day

pdc.name: Previous Day Close
pdc.description: Closing price of previous trading day
pdc.role: Pivot point - above = bullish bias, below = bearish bias
pdc.significance: Opening above/below PDC sets tone for day

fade_pdh.description: Short when price reaches PDH and shows rejection
fade_pdh.setup: Price approaches PDH, forms reversal candle (shooting star, bearish engulf)
fade_pdh.entry: Rejection candle close or break of candle low
fade_pdh.best_context: Ranging market, no strong bullish catalyst

fade_pdl.description: Long when price reaches PDL and shows rejection
fade_pdl.setup: Price approaches PDL, forms reversal candle (hammer, bullish engulf)
fade_pdl.entry: Rejection candle close or break of candle high
fade_pdl.best_context: Ranging market, no strong bearish catalyst

pdh_breakout.setup: Strong momentum, price breaks PDH with volume
pdh_breakout.entry: Close above PDH or retest of PDH as support
pdh_breakout.target: Distance from PDL to PDH, projected above PDH
pdh_breakout.note: Retest entry safer - wait for PDH to flip to support

pdl_breakdown.setup: Bearish momentum, price breaks PDL with volume
pdl_breakdown.entry: Close below PDL or retest of PDL as resistance
pdl_breakdown.target: Distance from PDH to PDL, projected below PDL
pdl_breakdown.note: Retest entry safer - wait for PDL to flip to resistance

pdc_as_pivot.description: Use PDC as pivot for intraday bias

above_pdc.strategy: Look for long opportunities, buy dips

below_pdc.strategy: Look for short opportunities, sell rallies

at_pdc.strategy: Wait for break and direction confirmation
at_pdc.note: Often consolidates around PDC before decisive move

gap_above_pdh.strategy: Look for continuation or wait for pullback to PDH

gap_below_pdl.strategy: Look for continuation or wait for bounce to PDL

gap_to_pdc.interpretation: Gap fill toward previous close common
gap_to_pdc.strategy: Fade gap, expect move toward PDC

asia.typical_behavior: Often ranges between PDH and PDL
asia.note: Low volume, levels tend to hold

london.note: Increased volume can break previous day levels

ny_open.typical_behavior: Often decisive - clear break or clear bounce
ny_open.note: Most likely time for PDH/PDL breaks

first_hour.description: Often tests PDH or PDL in first hour

last_hour.description: May push through levels or retreat to PDC

monday.note: Weekend gap often stays within Friday's range initially

tuesday.note: Most volatile day, higher break probability

friday.note: Profit taking, mean reversion to PDC

virgin_level.description: PDH or PDL not yet tested today

second_touch.description: Level touched, held, now touched again

failed_break.trading: Fade the false break - high win rate

previous_week_levels.strength: Weaker than daily but still significant

position_sizing.third_touch: Level likely breaks - fade or avoid

common_mistakes.no_confirmation: Entering at level without rejection candle
common_mistakes.tight_stops: Stop too close to level gets hunted
common_mistakes.chasing_breaks: Entering late after big move through level
